response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. Considering its quality and uniqueness, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. We are offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. We trust that its worth will align with your needs and aspirations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
